name: Find The Cats - Memory
description:
Beautifully crafted Memory board game which has engaged most of our childhood. Flip the tiles, match them, clear the board and try the next board with more tiles.

Find The Cats - Memory is a fun memory game that develops great memory skills. It is super simple to learn play. This matching game is a brain trainer, which can be played in any of your spare time.

Features:
✔ Play by making matches of cats
✔ 12 difficulty levels: from 2x2 up to 7x6 cards
✔ Funny cats
✔ Simple and easy-to-master interface
✔ Train your brain: concentration, observation, and logic
✔ Challenging game modes
✔ With timeout so be fast
